name: invoice-processor
description: Invoice processing and supplier matching system

scripts.validate: npm run synth -w infra && npm run build -w webapp
scripts.commit: npm run validate && npx generate-changelog && git add -A && npx cz
scripts.install-packages: npm config set registry=https://registry.npmjs.com/ && npm install && cd ./packages/infra && npm install && cd ../webapp && npm install
scripts.deploy-all: npm run deploy-backend && npm run deploy-frontend

author: Jady Liu
